Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Automobiles | Drama | Family
Status: New Series
Network: Discovery Channel ( USA)
Airs: Thursdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 06, 2012
Episode Order: 8

TEXAS CAR WARS follows the bidding wars between four Texas auto shops that are known for their fearlessness at auctions. Watch as they take different approaches to auto-flipping. Which garage will make the most money in each episode as they flip junk cars into one-of-a-kind automobiles?

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32594)
